response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its rarity and the quality involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exceptional piece to you for $1,200,000. I trust that its true worth will resonate with you, and I look forward to discussing how we might reach a mutually beneficial agreement. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering this special offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
